name: Gun Mute
description:
As Mute Lawton, a quick-draw gunslinger in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, it's up to you to shoot your way through the sheriff's posse of mutants and cyborgs until you reach the final showdown...

🌵Don't know what you're doing? Type "instructions" at the ">" and press enter!

😕Still don't know what you're doing? The command "hint" will tell you exactly how to win!

🏆This game was originally released in 2008, when it won the XYZZY Award for "Best Puzzles". 

🤓You can also download a .t3 version to use in your TADS interpreter of choice from this link.
